recipe.title: Tapenade-Rosemary Aïoli
instructions: With machine running, drop garlic and rosemary through feed tube of processor and finely chop. Add mayonnaise, tapenade, oil and vinegar and process until well blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to small bowl. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.)
